text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The student council is holding a<n>meeting in preparation for
"Winning<n>Dream Stage," a commemorative<n>concert
celebrating development and<n>progress in the world of
Umamusume<n>racing.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And that's all for the topics we have<n>concerning the
upcoming event.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Air Groove. Well then, that<n>concludes our regular
meeting... and<n>it's already dark out.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Man, I'm hungry. That took forever.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Brian! What's with that tone? You'd<n>think a vice president
would more<n>deeply appreciate the significance of<n>this
event!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes... I understand you've been<n>a bit overworked,
Brian. Hm, we'll<n>have to do something about that...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Howdyyy! Air Groooove! I'll lend you<n>a hand!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Brian is such a stubborn sourpuss! Ifyou asked me to help, I wouldfinish everything in a snap! ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Rudolf, is there anything I can do for<n>the commemorative
concert?<n>Everyone is looking forward to it, so I<n>want to
help.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You guys! Heh... Hahaha! Well, the<n>future certainly looks
bright! You've<n>paved us a way forward!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, everyone. With your<n>goodwill and cooperation, I
believe<n>we'll make speedy progress in our<n>preparations!
